mapper.select: SELECT ga.g_num, ga.g_title, ga.g_pic, ga.g_text, to_char(ga.g_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') g_time, ga.m_id, ga.g_secret, ( SELECT COUNT(go.gg_good) FROM cy_gallery_good go WHERE go.g_num = ga.g_num AND go.gg_good = 1 ) AS good_count FROM cy_gallery ga ORDER BY ga.g_num desc
select m_id from cy_gallery_good where g_num = #{g_num} and m_id = #{m_id}

SELECT co.gc_num as g_num, h.h_pic as g_pic, m.m_nick, TO_CHAR(co.gc_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS g_time, co.gc_text, ( SELECT COUNT(go.gcg_good) FROM cy_gallery_comment_good go WHERE go.gc_num = co.gc_num AND go.gcg_good = 1 ) AS good_count FROM cy_gallery_comment co JOIN cy_member m ON m.m_id = co.m_id JOIN cy_home h ON m.m_id = h.m_id WHERE co.g_num = #{g_num}
SELECT gc_text FROM cy_gallery_comment WHERE gc_num = #{g_num}
select m_nick, h_pic as g_pic from cy_member m join cy_home h on m.m_id = h.m_id WHERE m.m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cy_gallery VALUES (SEQ_cy_gallery_g_num.nextval, #{g_title}, #{g_pic}, #{g_text},systimestamp at time zone 'Asia/Seoul', #{m_id}, #{g_secret})
insert into cy_gallery_comment values(SEQ_cy_gallery_comment_gc_num.nextval, #{gc_text} ,#{g_num} ,#{m_id} ,SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul')
